A Hot Evening in July

A young man hesitates on a hot evening.  
He thinks, “I must avoid her again.”  

---

He creeps down the stairs, heart racing.  
“Why am I so afraid of her?”  
“I’m not a coward... am I?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A young man, burdened by debt and isolation, hesitates to leave his cramped garret due to his fear of encountering his landlady.
